prod_short_desc: Go Around the World on LEGO® DUPLO® adventures!
prod_long_desc:
This special LEGO® DUPLO® Around the World set puts a world of animals at your fingertips! Little explorers can travel from place to place by boat or plane to learn about different animals and their natural habitats. With 5 LEGO® DUPLO® figures plus 17 animals from all around the world, including a whale with opening mouth function!
Includes 5 LEGO® DUPLO® figures plus 17 animals from all around the world!
Features a buildable temple, savanna scene, forest scene, Antarctic scene and a buildable plane and boat.
Buildable temple features a tiger, tiger cub and a panda, plus bricks decorated as bamboo.
Savanna scene features a buildable cave with savanna tree, 2 lions with lion cub, 2 zebras and a hippo.
Forest scene features a buildable house with opening door and table, a tree with greenery and a hanging bridge, plus a bear, squirrel and 2 ducks.
Antarctic scene features 'ice block' bricks, a fish, 2 penguins and a whale with opening mouth and water spout element, plus a slide, video camera element and a brick decorated as shrimp.
With 4 different habitats in this special set, children can focus on individual builds or combine them all for a customizable play experience.
Young adventurers will love bridging the world with the buildable plane and boat.
LEGO® DUPLO® Around the World sets encourage early role play with lots of animal fun.
Use LEGO® DUPLO® Wildlife sets to talk to your child about wild animals, their habitats, conservation, different places in the world and the people and animals who live there—there's so much to learn!
LEGO® DUPLO® products are safe and specially designed to be fun and easy for little hands.
Temple measures over 8” high, 7” wide and 3” long.
Savanna scene measures over 8” high, 7” wide and 3” long.
Forest house measures over 6” high, 5” wide and 2” long.
Plane measures over 4” high, 7” long and 7” wide.
Boat measures over 5” high, 7” long and 4” wide.
